LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.FriendlyName.SmartStore.OrderNumberFormatter
LocaleResource.Value: Number Formatter

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value: By default, the incremented, numeric id for orders and customer are at the same time the order number or the customer number. This plugin helps you to create a custom number pattern that suits your business needs. Please consider that the pattern affects new orders and new registered customers only and that order numbers (once created) are immutable.

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.NumberFormatOrder
LocaleResource.Value: Order Number Format

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.NumberFormatOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: An arbitrary string pattern that can contain the placeholders %id (numeric order ID), %d (order date) and %c (customer ID). eg: 'OR-%d-%id' results in 'OR-20131022-1248'.

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.DateFormatOrder
LocaleResource.Value: Order Date Format

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.DateFormatOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Format for order date (placeholder %d) (eg: yyyyMMdd, ddMMyyyy, dd, MM etc.)

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.NumberMinLengthOrder
LocaleResource.Value: Min. Order Number Length

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.NumberMinLengthOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Min. length for order id (placeholder %id). Leading chars are prepended to the order id when it's too short (eg: 248 results in 000248 with setting 6)

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.LeadingCharOrder
LocaleResource.Value: Order Number Leading Char

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.LeadingCharOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The leading char that should be used to pad the order id.

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.NumberFormatCustomer
LocaleResource.Value: Customer Number Format

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.NumberFormatCustomer.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: An arbitrary string pattern that can contain the placeholders %id (numeric customer ID), %d (date) and %l (unique seo code of the customer langauge). eg: 'CN-%d-%id' results in 'CN-20131022-1248'.

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.DateFormatCustomer
LocaleResource.Value: Date Format

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.DateFormatCustomer.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Format for date (placeholder %d) (eg: yyyyMMdd, ddMMyyyy, dd, MM etc.)

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.NumberMinLengthCustomer
LocaleResource.Value: Min. Customer Number Length

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.NumberMinLengthCustomer.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Min. length for customer id (placeholder %id). Leading chars are prepended to the order id when it's too short (eg: 248 results in 000248 with setting 6)

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.LeadingCharCustomer
LocaleResource.Value: Customer Number Leading Char

LocaleResource.Name: Setting.LeadingCharCustomer.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The leading char that should be used to pad the order id.
